mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mem_stbl(memIdx, memID, memPassword, memName, memAge, memGender, memEmail, memProfile) VALUES((select IFNULL(MAX(memId)+1, 1) from mem_stbl memIdx) , #{memID},#{memPassword},#{memName},#{memAge},#{memGender},#{memEmail},#{memProfile})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM mem_stbl mem LEFT OUTER JOIN mem_auth auth on mem.memID=auth.memID where mem.memID = #{username}
select * from mem_stbl mem LEFT OUTER JOIN mem_auth auth on mem.memID=auth.memID where mem.memID=#{memID}
mapper.update: UPDATE mem_stbl SET memProfile=#{memProfile} WHERE memID=#{memID}
